ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // “Come by again.
I'll still be here
doin' business.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // “I'm sorry, we're sold out
and I've got nothing for you.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // “Hmm, I'm countin' on you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // “A protein drink set.
That jerk. I'm gonna do so much
more business than him,
his head'll spin.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // “A Stamina Drink Set.
That jerk. I'm gonna do so much
more business than him,
his head'll spin.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // “A Muscle Relaxing Cream Set.
That jerk. I'm gonna do so much
more business than him,
his head'll spin.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // “Thanks, bud.
I'm motivated now.
Take this, it's not much…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // Received Key Item "Diamond Tiara"!
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:26}); // Received Key Item "Ruby Tiara"!
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:27}); // Received Key Item "Glass Tiara"!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // “Hey man.
Got a minute?
I need to talk…man to man.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // “Really!
I really appreciate it.”{PAUSE}“I'm sorry, but young lady…
Would you turn the other way,
for a second?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // “I'm sorry, lady.”{PAUSE}“Now here's the thing.
Do you know that vending machine
in the Inn?”{PAUSE}“I'm itchin' to know
what they're selling in it.
I just can't ask a girl to go get it.”{PAUSE}“What? Why don't I buy it myself?
Well to tell you the truth,
I got in a fight with the guy at the Inn
and can't go there anymore.
Come on, so how 'bout it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // “Sorry about that.
Just forget it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // “Good, thanks.
I'll be waitin' here
when you're done.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // “Sorry about that.
Just forget it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // “I'm sorry, we're sold out
and I've got nothing for you.”

dialogStrings:
“I'm sorry, we're sold out
and I've got nothing for you.”

“Hey man.
Got a minute?
I need to talk…man to man.”

“Really!
I really appreciate it.”{PAUSE}“I'm sorry, but young lady…
Would you turn the other way,
for a second?”

“I'm sorry, lady.”{PAUSE}“Now here's the thing.
Do you know that vending machine
in the Inn?”{PAUSE}“I'm itchin' to know
what they're selling in it.
I just can't ask a girl to go get it.”{PAUSE}“What? Why don't I buy it myself?
Well to tell you the truth,
I got in a fight with the guy at the Inn
and can't go there anymore.
Come on, so how 'bout it?”

“Good, thanks.
I'll be waitin' here
when you're done.”

“A protein drink set.
That jerk. I'm gonna do so much
more business than him,
his head'll spin.”

“A Stamina Drink Set.
That jerk. I'm gonna do so much
more business than him,
his head'll spin.”

“A Muscle Relaxing Cream Set.
That jerk. I'm gonna do so much
more business than him,
his head'll spin.”

“Thanks, bud.
I'm motivated now.
Take this, it's not much…”

“Come by again.
I'll still be here
doin' business.”
